version_description:
[20. 07. 31 Update]
1. Modifying Buff Debuff Overlay Method
2. Modifying the entire passive unit of the same unit not to be applied
3. Add New Legendary Bluebird
4. Adding a new package
5. Fix lab icon errors
6. Added 7-day attendance event to celebrate launch
7. Lower design costs
8. Added automatic boss combat capability

[20. 08. 07 Update]
1. Add New World Space and Planetary SERNA
2. Add Assault Boss
3. Adding a list of advanced labs
4. Adding a mechanical reconstruction function by grade
5. Scales to up to 400 mechanical inventory
6. Add Main Quest
7. Adding chapter achievements

[20. 08. 08 Update]
1. Add New World Space and Planetary SERNA
2. Add Assault Boss
3. Adding a list of advanced labs
4. Adding a mechanical reconstruction function by grade
5. Scales to up to 400 mechanical inventory
6. Add Main Quest
7. Adding chapter achievements
8. Bug fix

[20. 08. 14 Update]
1. Add new mecanic
2. Adding a Parts Core Enhancement System
3. Adjusting Planetary Serna Drop Rates - Add Hero Drawing Drop
4. Add Planetary Serna Drop - Four More Legendary Parts Boxes
5. Adding a Legendary Parts Box Type
- Legendary Weapon Parts Box
- Legendary Engine Parts Box
- Legendary Sensor Parts Box
- Legendary suit parts box.
- Legendary Leg Parts Box
6. Add 1 New Package
7. Added parts locking functionality
8. Add Manual Save button

[20. 08. 21 Update]
1. Correction of the phenomenon in which the Cerna Legendary Parts box was dropped directly as an item.
2. Adding collector Junkie NPC to space
3. Add Quality Reconfiguration System
4. Adjusting the probability of strengthening the part's core
5. Adding new packages and terminating packages
6. Added goods compensation based on account level

[20. 08. 28 Update]
1. Raising the drop quantity of scraps of scrap metal, corestone mine.
2. Raising the rate of drop in the swamp box of Guwool and the legendary equipment when dropping rate.
3. Simplify tutorials.
4. Increase in black market discount rate.
5. Decrease the cost of mechanical reconstruction and modify it so that the same object does not appear in the reconstruction.
6. Add new packages.
7. DIA cost increased to 30 â†’ 50 for mechanical repair.
8. Increase the probability of A-tion and Legendary appearance from the confirmation of hero or higher for 10 diamonds.

[20. 09. 03 Update]
1. Add New Legendary Mechanic
2. Added automatic function for kings tunnel
3. Adding a new package

[20. 09. 21 Update]
1. Rescheduling Impossible Difficulties
2. Adding a new package
3. Modified bugs and improvements
- Modification of the phenomenon in which projectile form was applied ignoring the hit/evasion formula.
- Changed offline rewards so that they cannot be received if their parts inventory is full
4. Adding User Nickname Settings

[20. 09. 23 Update]
1. Modifying a phenomenon that may be repeatedly rewarded in a specific section of the tutorial.
2. Fixing the duplication of parts
3. Modifying the Initialization
4. Fixing other initialization problems

[20. 09. 26 Update]
1. Overlapping parts equipment and modifying initializing item reinforcement
2. Other initialization problems and bug fixes

[20. 09. 30 Update]
1. Add Ranking Board
2. Adding a new package to celebrate the Chuseok holiday
3. Fixing the problem where timers were operating abnormally in king's tunnels, landfills, and corestone mines.
4. Changing the formula for calculating team power (battle power)
5. Adjusting the Legendary Mechanic Balance

[20. 10. 09 Update]
1. Add Top-Level Laboratories
2. Added Cerna Planet Difficulty Level 6 to 10
3. Adding main quests and achievements
4. Add Big Brother Purge Dungeon
5. Fix errors in marking skills with a large number of yellow dagger tooltips

[20. 10. 09 Update]
1. Add Top-Level Laboratories
2. Added Cerna Planet Difficulty Level 6 to 10
3. Adding main quests and achievements
4. Add Big Brother Purge Dungeon
5. Fix errors in marking skills with a large number of yellow dagger tooltips

[20. 10. 19 Update]
1. King's Tunnel Rewards Downward
2. Big Brother sweep dungeon item drop rate adjustment
3. Change the amount of bonus for charging station DIAMOND products
4. Adding in-game announcements

[20. 10. 20 Update]
1. King's Tunnel Rewards Downward
2. Big Brother sweep dungeon item drop rate adjustment
3. Change the amount of bonus for charging station DIAMOND products
4. Adding in-game announcements
5. Other bug fixes

[21. 01. 29 Update]
1. Add 3 Transcendental Mechanics
2. Add new challenge content
3. Add Chat Feature
4. Add New Package

[21. 02. 25 Update]
1. Add New Myth Mechanics
2. Add Eriel Difficulty
3. Steady Storage Data Operations
4. Add new attendance events
5. Add New Package
